Major_Arcs.title: King Guz and Debt Deception
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around King Guz's feigned drowning and the subsequent confrontation about an unpaid debt, revealing his deceptive nature.

sub_scenes.title: Drowning and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: King Guz is seemingly drowning and is rescued by Alley, setting up a scenario of apparent gratitude which quickly turns sour.

Major_Arcs.title: Bronto's Bumping and Dinosaur Trade
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Bronto's clumsy behavior, leading to the idea of trading him in for a new dinosaur, culminating in a dealership visit and purchase.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto's Condition and Diagnosis
sub_scenes.description: Bronto's unusual behavior of bumping into trees is introduced and then discussed with Dinny, who provides a diagnosis based on age and mileage.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Dealership Visit and Purchase
sub_scenes.description: The idea of trading in Bronto leads to a visit to Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership, culminating in Alley considering and purchasing a new, smaller dinosaur after a test drive mishap.

narrative_arcs.title: Considering Dinosaur Size and Taking a Test Drive
Test Drive Mishap and Securing the Deal

sub_scenes.title: Farewell and New Beginnings
sub_scenes.description: The aftermath of the dinosaur trade, showing Alley's farewell to Bronto ('Pal'), his reflection on the trade, and his first journey with the new dinosaur ('Dinny'), alongside Bronto being prepped for sale.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Identity and Escape
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc involves a dinosaur sale that leads to a bumpy ride and the surprising revelation of 'Dinny's voice', followed by Dinny's mistreatment and subsequent escape.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Sale and Test Ride Mishap
sub_scenes.description: A new dinosaur is presented for sale, leading to a test ride that goes wrong and reveals a surprising identity.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Mistreatment and Chase
sub_scenes.description: Dinny faces mistreatment by a caveman with a club, leading to his escape and a chase scenario involving children.

Major_Arcs.title: Alley and Cooola's Relationship Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the rocky relationship between Alley and Cooola, starting with a fishing invitation, escalating to an argument and Cooola's seemingly supernatural dismissal of Alley.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Argument
sub_scenes.description: Alley invites Cooola fishing, but her rejection leads to an argument about Alley taking her for granted, culminating in a bizarre rock-falling incident.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Being Taken for Granted

Major_Arcs.title: Fishing Noise and Romantic Rivalry
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with noise disturbances during fishing and then transitions into a scenario of romantic competition and jealousy.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Disturbance and Noise Complaint
sub_scenes.description: Complaints about women being unpredictable lead to a scene of noisy baiting during fishing, causing further annoyance and confrontation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Noisy Baiting and Fishing Disturbance
Confrontation, Silence Request, and Woman Comparison

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Suspicion and Confirmation
sub_scenes.description: A fishing trip is interrupted by suspicion of romantic rivalry, with Oola being suspected of pursuing another man's woman, leading to observation and eventual confirmation of the flirtation.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Fight and Romantic Choice
sub_scenes.description: Romantic jealousy erupts into a physical fight, followed by the woman's clear choice of the 'redhead caveman' over the 'muscular caveman', leading to rejection and acceptance.

Major_Arcs.title: Pozy's Romantic Misadventures
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Pozy's attempts to win back Cherie using 'romance', leading to comedic failures and botanical blunders.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Strategy and Mimicry
sub_scenes.description: Pozy learns about 'romance' as a strategy and attempts to mimic Koko's romantic gestures, planning to outdo him with flowers.

sub_scenes.title: Botanical Blunder and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Pozy's attempt to present flowers to Cherie goes horribly wrong, involving a crocodile and leading to further rejection.

Major_Arcs.title: Misunderstandings and Jealousy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores themes of jealousy and misunderstanding in relationships, featuring flashbacks, possessive behavior, and comical misinterpretations.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Flashback and Possessive Dialogue
sub_scenes.description: A flashback reveals the muscular man's jealous nature, followed by a scene of possessive dialogue with Koko in a cave.

sub_scenes.title: Cannibal Attack Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: An outdoor accusation leads to a perceived 'cannibal attack', which is later revealed to be a humorous misunderstanding involving a finger bite during a kiss.

Major_Arcs.title: Relationship Conflicts and Romantic Turnaround
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts various relationship conflicts, including accusations of infidelity, physical retaliation, and finally, a romantic turnaround for Alley.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity Accusations and Retaliation
sub_scenes.description: Scenes of infidelity accusations and physical retaliation are shown, highlighting marital discord.

sub_scenes.title: Alley's Romantic Reformation
sub_scenes.description: Oola and Alley reconcile, leading to Alley's decision to become more romantic, inspired by a 'milk-fed Frenchman', and his initial attempts at romance.

sub_scenes.title: Men's Bewilderment with Women
sub_scenes.description: Two fishing men express their confusion and frustration with women, adding a comedic commentary on gender relations.

Major_Arcs.title: The Perils of the 'Twist' Dance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes a new dance craze, 'the Twist', showing its comical and painful consequences, from injuries to social pressures and dance lessons.

sub_scenes.title: Dance Injuries and Generational Gap
sub_scenes.description: The dangers of 'the Twist' are highlighted through injuries and commentary on older generations attempting the dance.

sub_scenes.title: Dance Lessons and Instructor Reveal
sub_scenes.description: A caveman seeks dance lessons, leading to a clumsy and painful experience, culminating in a comedic reveal of the instructor's true identity.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dance Studio and the Challenge

sub_scenes.title: The Twitch Performance and Hospitalization
sub_scenes.description: Alley-Oop performs 'the Twitch' dance, facing mockery and humiliation, leading to a surprising twist about hospitalizations caused by *watching* the dance, not doing it.

narrative_arcs.title: Humiliation Through Laughter During the Dance

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel Mishaps and Ancient Spain
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc involves time travel to ancient Spain, initially for research, but quickly devolving into romantic encounters, serenade mishaps, and bullfighting.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Plan and Romantic Distraction
sub_scenes.description: Scholars plan to use a time machine to gather information on ancient Spain, but upon checking in on their caveman friend in the past, they find him engaged in romance rather than research.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking First-Hand Information on Ancient Spain via Time Machine

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Activation and Transportation
sub_scenes.description: A kiss request is interrupted by the activation of a time machine, unexpectedly transporting Alley-Oop and Oola to the present.

narrative_arcs.title: Persistent Kiss Request and Reluctant Agreement
Time Machine Activation and Unexpected Transportation
Arrival in the Time Machine and Explanation
Arrival in the Twentieth Century and Wonmug's Assignment
Frustration over Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Oola's Role

sub_scenes.title: Serenade Mishap and Bullfight Contingency
sub_scenes.description: Back in ancient Spain, Alley-Oop's serenade goes awry, leading to intervention, a mistaken attack on a famous matador, and an unexpected bullfighting opportunity for a muscular man (Oop).

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Banter

sub_scenes.title: Return and Romantic Setback
sub_scenes.description: Oop returns from Spain, praised for bravery, but his promised kiss is interrupted and denied due to a jealous misunderstanding about a hair.

narrative_arcs.title: Bravery in Spain and a Kiss Promise

Major_Arcs.title: The 'King for a Day' Experiment
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the concept of 'King for a Day', showing the initial ease perceived by the king, the challenge to this notion, and the ironic and painful reality of temporary kingship.

sub_scenes.title: Kingship Challenge and Misinterpreted Respect
sub_scenes.description: The 'King for a Day' concept is introduced, challenged by a caveman, leading to a temporary kingship and a darkly humorous misinterpretation of 'respect'.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day Introduction and Initial Rule

Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Domestic and Royal Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the domestic and royal troubles faced by 'King Guz' (the temporary king), highlighting comedic mishaps with bon-bons, dirty feet, and resolving clam disputes.

sub_scenes.title: Bon-Bon Blunder and Domestic Discipline
sub_scenes.description: King Guz (temporary king) mistakenly eats ulcer pills, followed by Queen Oompa's reprimand for his dirty feet, leading to forced foot washing and his understanding of King Guz's need for vacations.

narrative_arcs.title: Forced Foot Washing and Vacation Justification

sub_scenes.title: Royal Disputes and Wise Intervention
sub_scenes.description: King Guz (temporary king) encounters multiple disputes, including cheating accusations and a money fight, resolving a clam ownership dispute with the help of a wise caveman.

sub_scenes.title: Royal Frustrations and Dining Disaster
sub_scenes.description: King Guz (temporary king) faces outdoor chaos, financial frustration with his advisor, and then a dining disaster with ulcer-aggravating food, leading to a violent outburst.

Major_Arcs.title: Leadership and Misfortune
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores themes of leadership, regret, and unexpected misfortune, featuring an apology scene, relief from rulership, a ruler offer, a strange measurement, a romantic prophecy, and forced shaving.

sub_scenes.title: Apology, Relief, and Ruler Offer
sub_scenes.description: An apology scene transitions to a caveman's relief at leaving rulership, followed by another caveman being offered the ruler role.

sub_scenes.title: Strange Measurement and Romantic Prophecy
sub_scenes.description: A bizarre scene of measuring 6 feet in relation to a 'Strange Duck' is followed by a woman excitedly recounting a romantic prophecy about a bearded stranger.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Shaving and Time Machine Setup
sub_scenes.description: The 'handsome, bearded stranger' from the prophecy is abruptly subjected to forced shaving, leading to a time machine setup and malfunction in a lab.
